scripts.clean: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:lint && npm run clean:install
scripts.clean:install: shx rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json yarn.lock pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.upassets: pnpm update && shx cp -ru node_modules/bootstrap/scss assets/scss/bootstrap && shx cp -ru node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.js assets/js/vendor  && shx cp -u node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js assets/js/vendor && shx cp -u node_modules/vue/dist/vue.common.dev.js asset/js/vendor  && shx cp -u node_modules/vue/dist/vue.min.js asset/js/vendor && shx cp -u node_modules/flatpickr/dist/flatpick.js assets/flatpickr  && shx cp -u node_modules/flatpickr/dist/flatpick.min.js assets/flatpickr && shx cp -u node_modules/flatpickr/dist/l10n/fr.js assets/flatpickr && shx cp -u node_modules/netlify-identity-widget/build/netlify-identity-widget.js assets/js/vendor && shx cp -u node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js assets/js/vendor
